requirements: Open to nondepartmental and non-School of Drama students with prior permission of the instructor.
description:
In this yearlong course, students develop an understanding of how projection can be integrated into the theatrical space. Students consider media as a storytelling tool and create storyboards and video projects. Emphasis is on exploration, collaboration, and thinking in pictures. Students are expected to participate in a number of digital skills seminars that are offered concurrently with this class.
Open to nondepartmental and non-School of Drama students with prior permission of the instructor.
